articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow's daughter Apple wears 2002 Academy Awards dress - USA TODAY
articles.description: Gwyneth Paltrow revealed Thursday that daughter Apple Martin tried on the Alexander McQueen gown she wore to the 74th Academy Awards in 2002.
